thread.title: Kirill Petrenko to take over Berlin Philharmonic in 2019
thread.title_full: Kirill Petrenko to take over Berlin Philharmonic in 2019 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Kirill Petrenko to take over Berlin Philharmonic in 2019
text:
BERLIN (AP) - Kirill Petrenko will take over as chief conductor at the Berlin Philharmonic in 2019, and will do the new job alongside his existing role as the Bavarian State Opera's musical director for the first two years.
The Philharmonic in June chose the Russian-born Petrenko to succeed chief conductor Simon Rattle, who is leaving in 2018. The orchestra initially left open when he would start.
On Tuesday, it said Petrenko will take over at the beginning of the 2019-2020 season but will give a reduced number of concerts in his first year because of his duties at the Bavarian State Opera.
Petrenko will remain the Munich opera house's musical director until August 2020, and will be a guest conductor there in the 2020-21 season.
